data.actual_result: Nothing happens, unless you manually add https:// in front of the link
data.expected_result: It should take you to the server invite confirmation screen
data.short_description: discord. gg links without the https:// prefix don't work in Join a server via invite link screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Scroll all the way down in your server list - Tap the + icon - Select Join a server via link - Paste a link formatted like `discord. gg/discord-testers` - Submit by tapping Join
